Author: Artemsv
Title: [ANN] Gameflip FLP [Official]
Body: Building FLIP (FLP) Demand and Announcing the Early Access Program for Game Publishers  Hello FLIP (FLP) supporters and welcome to another update!  Now that the token sale has ended with a smashing success, our team is focused on one key goal: building strong demand for FLP amongst gamers from all around the world. To deliver upon this goal, we are hard at work on several parallel initiatives including Publisher Partnerships, eSports Branding and Product Development. Here are the main developments in each of these categories:  Publisher Partnerships We are excited to announce the official launch of the FLP Early Access Program to a select group of innovative publishers who seek to expand their business onto the blockchain. Among the benefits, the early access program provides publishers with (1) substantial incentive FLP tokens to be distributed by the publisher to their community of gamers allowing them to transact digital goods in the Gameflip marketplace and (2) exclusive early access to the FLP SDK, allowing publishers to place their digital gaming goods onto the blockchain and leveraging smart contracts to execute fraud-free transactions. Publishers who integrate the FLP SDK will receive a commission for every transaction of their digital good that is enabled by the FLP crypto-token.  If you are a game publisher or developer and would like to contact us about the FLIP Early Access Program, please send your inquiry to bd@gameflip.com.  eSports Branding We are partnering with top global eSports organizations to bring FLP to the competitive gaming masses. eSports oriented games are the biggest drivers of demand for digital gaming goods and it’s one of the fastest growing segments within the gaming market. We are very excited to contribute to this growth and can’t wait to see the possibilities for FLP within the realm of competitive gaming.  Product Development As previously announced, FLP will soon be available as payment method in the Gameflip marketplace. Our SDK for collaboration with publishers will take development priority after FLP payments and payouts are available on Gameflip.  More news and announcements are coming soon! Stay tuned!  To get notifications on the latest news and developments of FLP, follow this Medium blog or join us on Twitter or Telegram.  https://medium.com/@fliptoken/building-flip-flp-demand-and-announcing-the-early-access-program-for-game-publishers-19ab15cc129d

Author: Gameflip ICO
Title: [ANN] Gameflip FLP [Official]
Body: The Gameflip ICO is now live and will run through January 29, 2018. Given the early pre-sale success, the ICO has a targeted goal of 15,000 ETH for the duration of the sale, with a trigger to end the sale 72 hours after reaching 30,000 ETH.  Minimum contributions for the campaign will be 0.1 ETH with no maximum purchase amount. The Gameflip team is currently working on accepting BTC payments and will have it ready this week. Bonuses will start at 25% and stagger down to 15% and 10% for later contributions, incentivizing early FLIP supporters to invest earlier in the ICO.  One way Gameflip stand out from other ICOs is with its focus on game publishers. Gameflip has reserved 40% of the total supply of FLIPs to incentivize publishers by allowing them to sell these FLIPs to their community and keep up to 100% of the proceeds. Gamers will also be incentivized by having access to a liquid marketplace that is safe, transparent and reliable.  “Publishers are the key to success in this market. Our competitors are trying to build marketplaces on the blockchain without an established platform behind them, an experienced team among them, or an outward focus on publishers guiding them — and that’s simply impossible,” said JT Nguyen, CEO of Gameflip.  Gameflip’s publisher-centric model is the product of decades of combined experience in the gaming industry. Prior to founding Gameflip, the company’s core team built the global games publishing business Aeria Games from the ground up, cultivating a community of 40 million gamers.  “The Gameflip team is excited to hit the ground running in this ICO. We have built out an amazing community of FLIP supporters, beyond our existing user base, that are passionate about gaming and creating a better gaming experience for everyone transacting digitally,” added JT Nguyen.

Author: Gameflip ICO
Title: [ANN] Gameflip FLP [Official]
Body: Gameflip is at the forefront addressing the demand for liquidity for digital goods. Our team is comprised of top notch gaming industry veterans, technology innovators, and proven entrepreneurs. We believe that having a handful of competitors in a new evolving space is good as it signals the market potential can be very large. We also believe it's wise to never underestimate any competitor!  The key advantages of FLIP are as follows:  1. Gameflip Marketplace Platform - The Gameflip marketplace platform has been transacting gaming digital goods since the beginning of 2016 with millions of dollars processed across 2 million gamers. We fully understand the risks associated with managing digital goods transactions and the strategy to scale the marketplace rapidly. Our plan is to enhance our platform to provide the highest levels of transparency and security by implementing blockchain and smart contracts.  2. Experience - Collectively, our Gameflip team has over a century of starting, operating and scaling start-up companies. This is our passion! On top of that, we have a world class team of advisors, including the co-founder of Electronic Arts, the co-founder of GREE and the founder of Bigpoint, all of which are the top global gaming companies across the globe.  3. Incentives for Publishers and Game Developers - This is a key point we believe our competitors have missed. Clearly, there is demand from gamers to sell their digital goods but the publishers are the gatekeepers. Without providing strong and aligned incentives, something we've done by allocating 40% of our FLIP tokens for network growth, we don't believe the publishers will join the decentralized network. If you step into their shoes, we are asking them to try out a new """"unproven"""" technology to develop a new revenue stream. This is risky for them so we need strong incentives as well as a clear onboarding plan, something which we know well since our team previously ran a $100M publishing business called Aeria Games before starting this business.
